name: North Perry Central FBO / ATA Flight School
about: North Perry Central FBO / ATA Flight School, located at North Perry Airport in Hollywood, Florida, is a comprehensive aviation training facility managed by pilots for pilots. We offer a range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot License, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot License, and Multi-Engine Rating. Our school also provides certification for Flight Instructors and accelerated flight training options to become a Private Pilot or Instrument Rated in 60 days. With a friendly and welcoming environment, we provide aviation fuel services, aircraft rental, and aerial tours. Our commitment is to curate a personalized flight training experience, helping students evolve from novice pilots to professional aviators. We pride ourselves on our dedicated staff and excellent service, ensuring a supportive and educational journey for all our students.
